events.message: I received my order today, but unfortunately the product is broken and has several scratches on the surface. This is disappointing as I was expecting a new undamaged item.
The issue has been identified as a product defect related to damaged and scratched items reported by the customer.
The case was assigned to agent Laura M. for further assistance with the reported product defect.
Hello, this is Laura from customer support. I'm sorry to hear that your product arrived damaged. Let me help you resolve this issue quickly.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and broken parts so we can assess the damage and process your case accordingly?
I have attached several pictures showing the scratched corners and the broken handle. Please let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement product shipped at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer. Please tell us which option you would like.
I would prefer a replacement product, thank you. Please let me know how long the shipping will take.
We have processed your replacement order with expedited shipping. You will receive a confirmation email with tracking information shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement product and that it arrived in perfect condition. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and it is in perfect condition. I appreciate your quick help resolving this.
We are glad to hear that the replacement product meets your expectations. We are closing this case, but please reach out anytime if you need further support.
